reviews.title: Makes custom Flashcards
reviews.comment: One annoyance: if you inadvertantly change orientation, it moves to next card, then skips another if you try to move it back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Always my first reflex to look up a word
reviews.comment: Useful, very clear, it helps a lot when I study, It\'s also my first reflex when I need a new word with my friend.  Lack: pinyin with accent on letter
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crappy app
reviews.comment: The dictionary part of it does not download. I have tried for days, even tried uninstalling and reinstalling it. The dictionary portion is broken.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Traditional Chinese Still Not Word!
reviews.comment: most likely traditional chinese words problem is fixing but most traditional words still not work! Hope to improve asap. Otherwise, this app is useless for those ppl who use traditional chinese words!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay but Traditional Chinese not working.
reviews.comment: I really like this dictionary for its straight forward mostly accurate translation, but the Traditional Chinese option isn\'t working for me. This is a disappointment. I hope Cidian will fix this problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My most used app
reviews.comment: love the custom flashcards. Just input characters as you come across them,  or from a hsk list,and it works great. free too! Love that it has progress percentage too. I\'ve downloaded 30 learn Chinese aids.  This one remains my favorite even after phone change. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I tried downloading the dictionary about 20 times, but was failing or was too slow. Also, the software doesn\'t support background download data \345\236\203\345\234\276

reviews.comment: Very happy with this app. Light, rich dict, easy to use. There are a few bugs and would be great if there were new features.
